reviewtext: This is probably the best 5 bucks you'll ever spend.  Certainly on headphones.  I had been using a $10 Koss over-the-ear headphone from Walmart.  This one beats it hands down.  I hear sounds that I haven't heard/noticed before on the Koss, my car stereo, my Altec Lansing VS2621 PC speaker, or my Harman Kardon HK395 PC speaker.  I listen to all kinds of music: pop, folk, piano, country, hip pop, soul... this headphone produces wonderful sound for all of them.  Highly recommended as a budget headphone.
